other_tests.findings: The liver demonstrates no focal or textural abnormalities. The gallbladder is normal without gallstones. A 1.1 x 0.9 x 0.7 cm avascular solid lesion associated with the upper pole of the left kidney, which was not seen on the prior ultrasound.
other_tests.changes_over_time: The avascular solid lesion was not seen on the prior ultrasound.
